code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Detail(){const{id}=useParams();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[movieDetail,setMovieDetail]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const getMovie=async()=>{const json=await(await fetch("https://yts.mx/api/v2/movie_details.json?movie_id=".concat(id))).json();setMovieDetail(json.data.movie);console.log('json.data.movie: ',json.data.movie);setLoading(false);};getMovie();},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading...."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["title: ",movieDetail.title]})});}export default Detail;
